body_html:
@yaroslavvb Thanks for answering.

If you look at my wrapper function you'll see that it can be fully backwards compatible.
If fetches is a list then the return value should of course still be a list.
If fetches is a dictionary then the return value should be a dictionary instead.

body:
@yaroslavvb Thanks for answering.

If you look at my wrapper function you'll see that it can be fully backwards compatible.
If `fetches` is a list then the return value should of course still be a list.
If `fetches` is a dictionary then the return value should be a dictionary instead.
